title: Flix: Movies and TV When You Want
description: Look up desired movies and TV shows to see what streaming services offer them, and save favorites.  Group project with Tressa Park and Bikram Shankhar. Tech: React, React Router, Express, Node, MongoDB, Redux, Material UI.

title: Group Project: My Pantry
description: App for finding recipes based on ingredients the user already has. Group project with Jules Lazar and Mohmed Vaid.

title: Group Project: Flyte!
description: Stock news and price app. Group project with Alex Bailon, Bikram Shankhar, Zaki Khan and Kyle Resurreccion.

title: Eat Da Burger!
description: App that tracks burgers the user has eaten and wants to try.

title: Budget Tracker
description: App that allows user to input and save transactions whether or not Internet service is available.

title: Note Taker
description: App that allows user to create and delete notes.

title: Team Roster
description: Creates and displays current information about a work team.  App generates HTML in Node. Click on Link to App to see demonstration video.
